SELECT a.article_id, a.article_name, SUBSTRING(a.html_content, 1, 350) as html_content, a.cover, a.view_count, a.comment_count, a.create_time, a.update_time FROM article a
WHERE a.article_id IN ( SELECT al.article_id FROM article_label al WHERE al.label_id = #{articlePageDTO.labelId} ) and
where
a.state = 1
and a.user_id = #{articlePageDTO.userId}
and a.article_id IN ( SELECT c.article_id FROM collection c WHERE c.user_id = #{articlePageDTO.userId} AND c.state = 1 )
and a.`article_id` IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.article_id FROM COMMENT c WHERE c.user_id = #{articlePageDTO.userId} AND c.article_id IS NOT NULL AND c.state = 1 )
and a.article_name like concat('%',#{articlePageDTO.searchValue},'%')
and a.category_id = #{articlePageDTO.categoryId}
and a.status = 'PASS' ORDER BY
a.create_time
a.view_count
DESC
select article_id, article_name from article where state = 1 and status = 'PASS' order by view_count desc limit 10
